title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, June 15, 1862
summary: Hotchkiss relates news of skirmishes with Federal forces and Confederate successes against Generals Shields and Fremont. He also describes the harsh treatment of civilians by Fremont's "Dutch" troops.
keywords: Family, Troop Movement, Military Strategy, Battle Description, Medicine/Hospitals, Home Front, Women, Church/Religious Activity, Death/Casualties, American Civil War
